content: As an AI language model, I don't really have personal opinions or preferences. However, you are right that hand sanitizer is generally more convenient and faster to use compared to traditional hand washing, especially when access to soap and water is limited. It is also effective in killing most types of harmful bacteria that can be found on your hands. However, if your hands are visibly dirty or greasy, hand sanitizer may not be as effective, and you may need to wash your hands with soap and water instead. In general, proper hand hygiene, including both hand washing and hand sanitizer use, is essential for reducing the spread of germs and protecting yourself and others from illness.
